Story Narrator: This story is about the modern person named Axel,who was a book reader.
One day he is reading the book of Five elements of nature,In a meanwhile he suddenly teleported to mysterious world
When he come to his senses he didn't know where he was
The place was full of mysterious creatures roaming, suddenly a stranger shouted.........

Strange person: Who are you and where are you from

Axel: I'M Axel , Axelblaze and I am from earth and I don't know where I am

Strange person: Axel Blaze! What a strange name? Are you a spy?

Axel: I'm not, I've already said where I'm from, whatever just say how can I return to my planet and who are you?

Strange person: I am disciple of master 'zhekumaza', who is a great master in fire kingdom

FireMaster Disciple: He is Well known as a fire fighter,you can ask him for help but he will not talk to lowlife creature like you

Axel: if I beat you too pulp you have to take me to your master and help me to return to my planet

FireMaster Disciple: you think you can beat me, what a joke

Axel: Even god must be crazy in creating me! No one can defeat me
